name: places/ChIJn9oCeL9YwokRF6qCbjvTiKs
adrFormatAddress: 1467 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
Very well run salon with friendly front desk and good atmosphere overall. Leo was doing my hair, in particular balayage. I must say he was extremely attentive and very careful with my hair. I never experienced hair stylists untangle hair with a brush while washing it. I was really appreciative that he did care about me not losing extra hair during this process.

Despite doing a pretty good job with highlights, it did take quite a long time. I spent about 5 hours in the salon, something that I did not plan to do. Overall, I have positive feedback about this establishment.

originalText.text:
I tried this salon through Groupon first, back in April. Myrna was my colorist. I went for a full head of highlights and she did a superb job. I told her that I was going to be a regular client of hers if I loved my highlights tomorrow in daylight as when you are in salons sometimes it is difficult to see whether or not the shade is right with all the artificial lights. Next day, upon waking I fell in love. She is now my go to colorist for sure. Looking forward to getting a refresher ASAP just in time with my move back to my old neighborhood, UES, super close to their location as well, by coincidence. I am relieved to find my perfect colorist, hopefully, that is, unless the first experience was just pure luck -which is unlikely- so I am making my second appointment tomorrow with her..
will refresh this review after I get it done which I am very much looking forward to..

originalText.text: Amazing blowout from Matilda. She was very fast, accommodating for me as a walk-in and did great quality. The receptionist was very nice at first but as I was checking out she got very overwhelmed having people on hold and also dealing with people at the front causing her to yell at another coworker how X isn’t her job and she is so busy. It didn’t seem busy to me and she needs to learn how to better multi task while remaining calm and professional. I told her how her yelling frazzled me because she then yelled at me when I asked her for change. She didn’t apologize, she basically made fun of me. She’s very unprofessional and I would reconsider coming here due to her behavior. She said at least 2 times how she was overwhelmed, she doesn’t do that, it’s not her job. The girl at the front should be able to handle a lot of tasks and a fast paced environment. It’s as if she felt the nice woman washing hair should have been doing her job for her. This woman not only needs additional training she needs an attitude adjustment. I don’t usually leave reviews but as someone who lives in the neighborhood and has been to both locations of this salon I could not stay silent on someone acting like an untrained wild animal.

originalText.text: Mirna had very experienced hands, a professional yet caring demeanor and she is also loads of fun!! I got this through groupon but I am definitely going to be a repeat customer even without groupon. She is fantastic and all the staff are great as well!

text.text: Mirna had very experienced hands, a professional yet caring demeanor and she is also loads of fun!! I got this through groupon but I am definitely going to be a repeat customer even without groupon. She is fantastic and all the staff are great as well!

originalText.text: A wonderful salon. The whole staff makes you feel welcome and respected. Mirna Franco did my highlights nicely. I normally dislike the salon experience, but this place is the exception.
